column4: anyone has VirtualBox working with WinXP guest and shared folders? I tend to get a blue screen of death when accessing my ubuntu folders...
as a work-around you could use Samba on your Ubuntu to share to you WinXP guest
if you really need shared folders try asking in #vbox
